resources.string:
- GENERAL INFO: 
# most statuses replace the old values if already assigned and decrease by 1 at the end of every turn. 
# all dmg is "normal" (use dmg modifiers and trigger "recharge by getting hitted") if non otherwise specified. 
# dc: count down; the "charge" amount steel needed to use an ability; normally decrease by 1 at the end of every turn. 
# fixed damage: ignore all dmg modifiers. 
# special damage: ignore all dmg modifiers, do not recharge abilities that recharge by taking dmg. 
# ethereal damage: do not recharge abilities that recharge by taking dmg. 
# last taken physical dmg: the last normal or fixed dmg taken. 
 
- EFFECTS: 
# slow: is added not replaced, when slowed used abilities have +1 cd. 
# fire: deal damage at the end of the turn, when adding fire take the highest damage with the sum of the duration.
